snippet.title: Ridge Racer Driftopia - PS3/PC - Free 2 Drift (Trailer)
snippet.description:
Ridge Racer is back, and for the first time as a free-to-play game!

RIDGE RACER Driftopia will put the series' irresistible signature drifting right at the heart of the experience, with more details to be announced soon.

Ridge Racer Driftopia will be available on PS3 and PC later in 2013.
